Title: Truths Other Than the Ones You Tell Yourself
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Adam Targum
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: After receiving the voice message from Veronica, Hood and Brock go out looking for her. Meanwhile things get more heated between Calvin and Proctor.
